Lynchburg.Allied Arts Building: The Allied Arts Building is a historic high-rise office building located at 725 Church Street in Lynchburg, Virginia. Construction of the building began in 1929 and was completed in 1931, and it was designed by Stanhope S. Johnson and Addison Staples. The 17-story, 40-foot (12 m) by 132-foot (40 m) building is steel framed and faced in yellow brick and greenstone in Art Deco style.
